title: The Wonderful Works of Nickolay the Wonderful
itunes:title: The Wonderful Works of Nickolay the Wonderful
itunes:subtitle: The Creepypasta Anthology
description:
Some kind of wonderful...

***

Written by: Rene Rehn and Narrated by: Rissa Montanez

***

Bonus Episode: "There Was A Girl" written by JC Michael

***

Find our reward tiers and how to get your bonus magnet at patreon.com/creepypod

***

You can also subscribe to us on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/creepypod

***

Sound Design by Pacific Obadiah

***

Title music by Alex Aldea



Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
